Question: In December 2007, this person co-starred with Luke Wilson in her third film, Blonde Ambition.
Hints: In 2013 VH1 ranked this person #32 on their 100 Sexiest Artists of All Time list.
This person has listed Mariah Carey, Aretha Franklin, and Whitney Houston as influences on her music.
